## asBytes() function

Transducer which converts [BinStructItem](./transducers-binary.binstructitem.md) inputs to bytes. If `src` iterable is given, yields an iterator of unsigned bytes (e.g. for streaming purposes).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function asBytes(): Transducer<BinStructItem, number>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<BinStructItem, number>`

## Example


```ts
hexDumpString({}, asBytes([
  str("hello!"),
  u32(0xdecafbad),
  i16(-1),
  f32(Math.PI)
]))
// 00000000 | 68 65 6c 6c 6f 21 de ca fb ad ff ff 40 49 0f db | hello!......@I..

```
